description: A Dashboard for Synology NAS based on SNMP and Prometheus

targets.expr: (memTotalReal{target="nas", instance='$Device'} - (memAvailReal{target="nas", instance='$Device'} + memCached{target="nas", instance='$Device'} + memBuffer{target="nas", instance='$Device'})) / memTotalReal{target="nas", instance='$Device'}

title: Synology / Overview
